授業目的: The purpose of this course is for students to understand basic principles of international environmental policies.
到達目標:
By the end of semester, students will be able to
-identify key actors in environmental politics and their roles;
-understand complexities of environmental issues through case studies in various regions of the world;
-understand roles of the Japanese government, industries, and other actors to promote sustainable use of natural resources worldwide.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
